data.name: Necrophobia
data.detailed_description:
Necrophobia a New Fantasy Open World Action RPG
Rise from the depths of the underworld gain power as you progress and fight new enemies.

A Huge Open World With Tons to Explore

A huge open world where villages, mountains, lakes, and more all exist, as you explore the joy of discovering knew things awaits you!

An Epic Story Created From a Myth

A storyline thats told in bits and pieces as it unfolds. An epic main storyline with tons of smaller side storylines, complete these for massive rewards!

Multiplayer

You can now play with your friends as you explore, fight, kill, and conquer. Unfold the storyline together as you slay epic beasts!
data.about_the_game:
Necrophobia a New Fantasy Open World Action RPG
Rise from the depths of the underworld gain power as you progress and fight new enemies.

Multiplayer

data.short_description: This is a real time fantasy rpg with different ways to play! You can be a spell casting wizard or you can be a sword and shield warrior! Tons of updates to come and I am excited to see what happens!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 7 5700x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 7 5700x
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
